Articles.Content:
So, which way of exploring Deep Space should we attempt:

1.) Build something akin to NAUTILUS-X

2.) Go DIRECT

3.) Start using in-space fabrication craft for ISRU

I would say a combination of 1 and 3, but what do you guys propose?

Any combo of the three will be a good answer.

(Other options added by the community will be present eventually, as long as they make sense)

How about all 3, depending on the destination? Go Direct to Mars, Build Nautilus-X for long term exploration of the inner solar system and perhaps the outter planets, and if possible, do it with in-space fabrication.
